EmailTemplate.name: ATR Messages.ATR Ops Conference Frankfurt 05.12.2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit Honeywell at the Airbus Support Improvement Meeting May 19 - 21
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com/services> <https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace>
Airbus Support Improvement Meeting – Frankfurt
We hope to see you next week at Airbus’ Support Improvement Meeting
Come see for yourself the new level of service we’ve built on your comments, feedback, and needs. We’ll be facilitating several key sessions, as well as gathering your thoughts and reactions to these new initiatives.
Aware of our need to improve in some areas, we have committed to increasing On-Time Delivery for avionics and mechanical repairs and spares, along with other key performance metrics.
If it’s been a while, take a look at Honeywell. Stop by our session at the Airbus Support Improvement Meeting on May 19th, or read on to learn more.
You’re going to like what lies ahead...
- Performance Accelerator – Introducing a Service Bulletin search so customizable, it’s like we built it just for you. Every service bulletin you need to see, and not a single one you don’t. With the all-new, online Performance Accelerator <http://goaero.honeywell.com/THZQZ00030000I320q00GX0>, select your own search criteria, and the Service Bulletins and upgrades relevant to your fleet are there immediately. - Aerospace Technical Support – Reach Honeywell technical experts 24/7, with just one number (1-855-808-6500). No long waits or handoffs from department to department - just quick, accurate, precise solutions to keep you flying.
Airbus Support Improvement Meeting May 19 - 21 Sheraton Frankfurt Congress Hotel Frankfurt, Germany Can’t make it? Don’t worry, we’re coming to you! In the next year alone, we’ll be at more than 60 OEM events and conferences – like the one in Frankfurt – ready to answer your questions and address your concerns. In the meantime, learn about Honeywell’s portal enhancements that simplify your online experience.
- Checkout our new GTO video. (Watch video) <https://youtu.be/7KqbTtAj9dE> - Find out how to download a Tech Pub's document using your iPad. (Watch video) <http://commerce.honeywell.com/wcsstore/B2BDirectMyAerospaceAssetStore/images/catalog/Download_TechPubs_In_IPad.mp4> - How to get automatic email notifications on your order. (Watch video) <http://commerce.honeywell.com/wcsstore/B2BDirectMyAerospaceAssetStore/images/catalog/Email_Notifications_How_to.flv> - Check pricing and parts availability. (Watch video) <http://commerce.honeywell.com/wcsstore/B2BDirectMyAerospaceAssetStore/images/catalog/Search_for_a_Part_How_to.mp4>
